seo.opengraphTitle: The words Of The Former WWE Champion Will Tell You Why Brock Lesnar Is Called The Beast Avatar' - News Control

post.content:
‘The Beast Avatar’ Brock Lesnar is the toughest WWE Superstar the pro-wrestling world hasn’t seen yet. Lesnar began his career in WWE after a successful NCAA amateur wrestling run and then moved to the UFC for several years.

WWE Superstar, The Miz defeated Brock Lesnar in the ring

He has become the company’s biggest highlight since his return to WWE in 2012. He has made several billions of dollars for the company. Also, he has had some of the best and most memorable fights and matches in the last 10 years. A while back, WWE Superstar, The Miz commented on his desire not to face Brock Lesnar in the ring. He claimed that if anyone had to have a match against Lesnar, he would stay away from the ring.

Read More: The Bachelorette Star Rachel Rackia Is Bachelor Nation Hottest Pilot

The Miz responds to Bill Weinstock

Miz said, “I fight some of the toughest people I’ve met in my entire life. Brock Lesnar is always one of those people you never want to step into the ring with. When you’re one of the guys fighting Brock Lesnar If you hear your name as one of them, you’re like ‘ugh ugh. That’s tough.

Former two-time Divas Champion Maris

Former two-time Divas Champion Maris was also present with her husband during the QnA session. She chose Ronda Rousey, whom she never wants to face in the ring. Looks like the ‘IT couple’ doesn’t want to come under the radar of the two former UFC World Champions.

Brock Lesnar’s Secret Retirement

Before WrestleMania 38, Brock Lesnar appeared on The Michael’s Show. The appearance was preceded by a WWE live event at Madison Square Garden where he discussed his WrestleMania 38 match against Roman Reigns and other things. Lesnar also told him about his plans to retire in 2020.
